ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Growing plants for the purpose of subsistence or production. The cultivation of plants and the improvement of their properties begins with agriculture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tree sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sow the local biome's natural trees in your fields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Knowledge of small fruit-bearing plants and methods of their cultivation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruit trees
ResearchProjectDef.description: Knowledge of cultivated fruit plants and methods of their cultivation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetables
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vegetables are rich in fiber and trace elements. In addition, they are relatively easy to cultivate on a large scale.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mushrooms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mushroom growing is a complex but potentially profitable occupation that allows you to get mushrooms in cultivation conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Melons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gourds grow long enough, but their fruits grow to enormous sizes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cereals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cereal crops since the antiquity of mankind are in great demand and were cultivated everywhere.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial crops I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cotton and other industrial crops are not intended to feed the population, but will be useful for much more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial crops II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial crops are necessary for the development of production, as well as their cultivation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Drug crops I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Drugs have been used by mankind since antiquity as ritual potions. Now they can be used to treat diseases or relieve stress.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Drug crops II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Drugs have been used by mankind since antiquity as ritual potions. Now they can be used to treat diseases or relieve stress.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Buildings for compact and secure storage of items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wooden floors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Wooden coverings of different configurations can create an interior and ennoble the premises.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Heat-resistant stone coatings are perfect for the workshop. In addition, they are very attractive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic floors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Durable floor coverings that are clean.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating simple but useful tools will help you manage your time better and work more efficiently.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basics mechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Knowledge of the operation of mechanical devices, their basic elements and their applications.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basics hydromechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: A system of knowledge about the behavior of fluids, the laws of physics and how to apply them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Liquids storages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Blueprints for assembling large liquid storage facilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Steam is the main driving force for mechanisms. Some of them are capable of amazing things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial steam boilers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Efficient use of coal and combustible liquids will help to avoid the rapid depletion of reserves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial storages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construction technology of large and capacious storage facilities for industrial needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Water production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Machines for extracting water from under the earth's surface are necessary for the needs of the steam industry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Drilling of the wells
ResearchProjectDef.description: The wells are powered by steam, pumping water out of the ground steadily, regardless of wind speed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mixer
ResearchProjectDef.description: The mixer can be used to produce concrete, or other things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Steam engines can also replace humans in food production, producing formulaic recipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fuel lamps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Solid fuel and liquid lamps will make your life much better.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basics biology
ResearchProjectDef.description: The system of knowledge about the structure of biological organisms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam farm
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automatic plant growing machine. Consumes steam, water, seeds and fertilizer to work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Electrolysis, chemical reactions and processes are at the heart of progress and transformation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fertilizer production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fertilizers are used to improve soil fertility and for artificial growing environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automaton production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automatons are soulless machines designed to serve man and do dirty work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced alloys
ResearchProjectDef.description: The development of alloy casting technologies makes it possible to produce high-quality technical alloys for complex tools and machines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weaving industry
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of an automated mechanism is much more convenient and practical than the manual labor of a worker.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufacture of artificial synthetic fibers for tailoring.

ResearchProjectDef.label: SteamReactors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Large reactors for the production of energy from the mechanical movement of the shafts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthetic prostheses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Flexible, durable and almost perfect prostheses based on micromechanics technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automaton workers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic work robots with a set of commands and instructions built using gears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automaton soldiers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic combat robots with a set of commands and instructions built using gears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automaton medics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic medical robots capable of treating wounds and performing surgeries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robots production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced robots with a wide range of tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robot workers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced work robots capable of efficient and precise work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robot soldiers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced combat robots with additional sensors and a combat program.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robot medics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced robots that are engaged in treatment and operations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robot AI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Robots with a semblance of reason. It is difficult to say whether they are really intelligent. These robots are able to conduct research and experience emotions. Could it be dangerous for us?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Airships
ResearchProjectDef.description: Huge airships lifted into the air due to volatile gases. Such airships are driven by engines that consume fuel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fundamentals of industrial engineering. Allows you to collect small vehicles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced mechanical engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Precise and complex engineering, allowing the construction of large vehicles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tanks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Huge war machines that destroy the battlefield with their guns.
